item.description:
Come join us as we listen to some great music provided by The US Navy Concert Band. Folks this is a FREE concert! So why not come out, enjoy and show your support for our troops.

The concert features some of the nation's top musicians performing a variety of music from classical orchestral works to original arrangements of current popular favorites, as well as traditional marches and patriotic fare.

I know it is a bit short on notice, but what do you do on a Monday night anyway? So come out and listen to some terrific music with us!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri in the Lobby...cell is 203-808-5829
item.why: We want to support Our Troops!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: US Navy Concert Band @ The Warner Theatre...
